battles.name: battle62
battles.intro: You spent so much effort fortifying your outer cities that you left the heart of your nation ripe for the taking. Your chief judge is dead, and I am claiming this land in the name of Tubaloth, son of Ammoron, King of the Lamanites!
battles.narration: Thus endeth the days of Coriantumr, the only one to have ever conquered the great city Zarahemla, only to lose it again in a day.

battles.name: battle48
battles.intro: I will not give up my rule so easily, Pahoran.
battles.narration: Pachus and the leaders of the King Men were swiftly executed for their treason. The rest swore an oath to defend the cause of liberty.

battles.name: battle21
battles.intro: How can you not see that this is the only way to save our people? It doesn't matter. There is no way you can stop me from taking the throne. The people are continually flocking to my army.
battles.narration: Amalickiah and the remainder of his army retreated and fled to the south.

battles.name: battle21
battles.intro: Thank you for helping me gain the favor of the people. But you and your men are a liability. I am sorry to do this to you, Moroni, but it is for the good of the poeple.
battles.narration: Amalickiah and some of his men escaped and fled to the south.

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: Captain! Amalickiah has already gained favor of nearly half the people. He cannot win an election, but many of his followers will help him overthrow the government by force. I don't think we can win against him unless we can somehow inspire the people to join us to stop him. Please go talk to your servant in your house in the neighboring village Melek. He says he has an idea.

battles.intro: So, Alma thinks he can sentence me to death. I will never surrender!
battles.exit: You may have won this battle, but I have many allies that will harbor me. -- Nehor fled to an unknown location.
battles.name: battle01

battles.intro: Alma thinks he can rule us? We do not recognize his authority!
battles.name: battle02

battles.intro: The Order of the Nehors has claimed this village!
battles.name: battle03

battles.intro: We will not fight the Lamanites until we can have a king established in the land!
battles.name: battle25
battle24
battles.intro: I have been busy, Moroni. It is your great honor to stand before the king of the Lamanites. It's fascinating what can be accomplished with a small dagger, a few drops of poison, and some misdirection of information. Now bow before me or die!
battles.exit: I will be back with another army, and when I am, I swear I will drink your blood!

battles.name: battle47
battles.intro: Halt! Who dares to attack the chief judge?
battles.exit: Moroni, is that you? I thought you were King Men. There is much we need to discuss. Please come see me in the palace.

battles.name: battle08
battles.intro: Perhaps I could not overthrow you on my own, but now I have allied with the king of the Lamanites. Nothing will stop me and my followers from ruling over you.
battles.narration: Alma slew Amlici with the sword, and the Lamanites were driven out of the land. The judges, the voice of the people, and their freedoms remain protected.

battles.name: battle09
battles.intro: You want Lamoni's flocks back? Well too bad, they're mine now.

battles.name: battle10
battles.intro: The Nephites are not welcome in our land.
Alma, do you really think you can stand against me? I will subject this people under my rule!
battles.name: battle07
battles.exit: You may have won this battle, but I have a surprise waiting for you at Minon.

battles.intro: Alma, do you really think you can stand against me? I will subject this people under my rule!
battles.name: battle07
battles.exit: You may have won this battle, but I have a surprise waiting for you at Minon.

battles.name: battle27
battles.intro: Look what your betrayal has cost you. Nearly all Nephite cities are under my control. When I reach Zarahemla, I will slay Pahoran on his throne and finally rule over all the land!
battles.narration: Teancum put a javelin to the king's heart, immediately causing his death. Amalickiah's treachery was finally brought to an end.

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: To the east and north, there is a cove in the mountains where a swordsmith and his apprentice reside. The apprentice has made a special weapon which can help us in the fight with Amalickiah.

battles.name: battle28
battles.intro: I will finish this war in the name of my brother Amalickiah, whom you have murdered.
battles.exit: Go home, Moroni. You are no match for me.

battles.name: battle28
battles.intro: I will finish this war in the name of my brother Amalickiah, whom you have murdered.
battles.exit: Go home, Moroni. You are no match for me.

ai_sprite.name: alma
ai_sprite.dialog: Now that Amlici is defeated, I must return to the judgment seat in Zarahemla. Please see me there when you get a chance.

battles.name: battle14
battles.intro: You will not find the land of Middoni so easy to pass through.

battles.name: battle11
battles.intro: To the battlefield!

battles.name: battle12
battles.intro: Let us see what Moroni's army is really made of.

battles.name: battle13
battles.intro: You cannot steal away the sympathizers. We will root them out and punish them severely for dishonoring their king!

battles.name: battle15
battles.intro: Destroy Moroni's army!

battles.name: battle16
battles.intro: Run home and tell Nephihah how terrible Amulonah is.

battles.name: battle17
battles.intro: My son Lamoni is a fool for trusting you. The Nephites have been robbers from the beginning. When I have destroyed you I will then destroy him for his insolence.

exit.text: Please don't kill me! I will give you half of my kingdom if you spare my life!

next_dialog.text: I'm glad we could reach an agreement. I will deliver up to you this northern part of my kingdom.

prompt.next_dialog: Very well. Come into my palace and we will arrange everything.
Perhaps Lamoni was right about you. You do not care for riches and power but are a true friend to him and have shown me mercy. Let me join your cause. ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Mathoni has joined your army!

battles.narration: All the defecting Lamanites have been rescued. Bring them back to Nephite territory and find a safe place for them!

battles.name: battle18
battles.intro: We didn't leave a single survivor in Ammonihah when we razed it to the ground. Manti is next.
battles.narration: Moroni caused Zerahemnah and the Lamanite army to depart with a covenant of peace.

battles.name: battle26
battles.intro: We will not fight the Lamanites until we can have a king established in the land!

battles.name: battle19
battles.intro: The people of Ammon in Jershon have mocked us and must therefore be humbled. You would really defend a band of pacifists? It is no wonder that God has chosen my people over you!
battles.exit: Regroup, men! We will join forces with the Lamanites!

battles.name: battle36
battles.intro: Defend this city, men, in the name of your king!

battles.name: battle23
battles.intro: Come to rob the land that is rightfully ours? We will defend it with the sword!
battles.narration: Morianton died in battle and the dispute between the cities of Morianton and Lehi was settled.

battles.name: battle35
battles.intro: Let us see what Moroni's army is really made of.

battles.name: battle22
battles.intro: I was destined to save the Nephites, but they have all betrayed me! I will stir up the Lamanites to anger and use them to effect my vengeance!
battles.narration: In the heat of battle, Amalickiah and a few of his followers slipped away and could not be found.

battles.name: battle29
battles.intro: To the battlefield!

battles.name: battle30
battles.intro: Defend this city, men, in the name of your king!
battles.narration: Jacob, having an unconquerable spirit, refused to surrender and was slain in battle.

battles.name: battle31
battles.intro: Go home and tell Pahoran how terrible Riplah is.

battles.name: battle32
battles.intro: Destroy Moroni's army!

battles.name: battle33
battles.intro: Do you really think you stand a chance against me?

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: The Lamanites have retaken the city of Nephihah. We don't know why the government stopped sending us food and men. Can you go find out what is happening in Zarahemla? We can't take back Nephihah until we get reinforcements.

battles.name: battle49
battles.intro: You wish to have your precious city back, do you?

battles.name: battle37
battles.intro: Your puny army makes me laugh.
battles.exit: You haven't seen the last of me.
battles.narration: The city of Nephihah has been reclaimed, and the Lamanites have been driven further back. People are beginning to return once again to their homes. Speak to the chief judge in Zarahemla for further instructions.

battles.name: battle38
battles.intro: Ha! What a sorry excuse for an army.

battles.name: battle39
battles.intro: You will not find this city as easy to take as Zeezrom.
battles.exit: You are a worthy opponent. I look forward to our next encounter.

battles.name: battle40
battles.intro: Run home and tell Pahoran how terrible Gimgimno is.

battles.name: battle43
battles.intro: To the battlefield! Destroy Moroni's army!

battles.name: battle44
battles.intro: It will be my great pleasure to end you.
battles.narration: The city of Cumeni has been reclaimed, and the Lamanites have been driven further back. People are beginning to return once again to their homes. Speak to the chief judge in Zarahemla for further instructions.

battles.name: battle45
battles.intro: The land of Zarahemla belongs to the King Men now!

battles.name: battle46
battles.intro: Your army will go no further.

battles.name: battle50
battles.intro: To the battlefield!

battles.name: battle51
battles.intro: Run home and tell Pahoran how terrible Lehonti is.

battles.name: battle53
battles.intro: Fight in the name of your king!

battles.name: battle54
battles.intro: Ha! What a sorry excuse for an army.

battles.name: battle55
battles.intro: Well done, Moroni. You have come so far only to be crushed by my hand. It is time the Nephites subjected themselves to whom the government belongs!
battles.narration: The massive slaughter wrought by Amalickiah and his brother Ammoron has finally been brought to an end. With Ammoron slain and the city of Moroni recovered, all the Nephite lands are once again protected, and perhaps we will know peace.

battles.name: battle71
battles.intro: Most noble Moronihah! It seems a pity to me that you suppose you can stand against my great band of robbers. They do now wait with great anxiety for me to give the word to descend upon your people and destroy them.
battles.narration: Giddianhi retreated with the remainder of his men to their other strongholds.

battles.name: battle73
battles.intro: Destroy Moronihah's army!

battles.name: battle74
battles.intro: Ha! What a sorry excuse for an army.

battles.name: battle75
battles.intro: You will not find the fortress of Angola so easy to pass through.

battles.name: battle76
battles.intro: Join us, and we will spare your miserable lives.

battles.name: battle77
battles.intro: Learn of our secret combinations, and you will find riches and power.

battles.name: battle78
battles.intro: Why waste your talents supporting a fallen government?

battles.name: battle79
battles.intro: Who is Moronihah, that I and my people should fear him?

battles.name: battle80
battles.intro: I see you have decided against my offer. Understand this. I'm not just going to destroy you. I will hunt down your father, your mother, your wife, and your children. My band will enter into their homes at night as they sleep peacefully in their beds. Your death is only the beginning of your suffering.

narration.text: Giddianhi was taken and hanged from a tree. The secret band of Gadianton has been eradicated.
Giddianhi was taken and hanged from a tree. But Zemnarihah has assumed command of the Gadianton Robbers farther north.

battles.name: battle81
battles.intro: Moronihah's army. You can't stand against my thunder.
battles.exit: I will be waiting for you in Desolation, if you are so eager to die.

battles.name: battle82
battles.intro: Let us see what Moronihah's army is really made of.

battles.name: battle83
battles.intro: You will not find the city of Jordan so easy to pass through.

battles.name: battle84
battles.intro: Long has it been since I have faced a worthy opponent.

battles.name: battle85
battles.intro: Destroy the Nephite army!
